description: """"We will shut you down, we will cite you, and if we need to, we will arrest you and we will take you to jail,"""" she said Saturday during a press conference. """"If you host a party, promote a party, or go to a party, we are not playing games. We mean business, and we will shut this down one way or another,"""" she said, NBC Chicago reported. """"The time for educating people into compliance is over. Don’t be stupid. We’re watching you, and we’re going to take decisive action."""" Time to rise up, Chicago!
